EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2019-01-23 Cloud Status Quo.Sorry we missed you
EmailTemplate.subject: [WEBINAR RECORDING] {{my.Webinar Title:default=the webinar}}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Sorry we missed you for {{my.Webinar Title:default=The Webinar}}.
You can watch the webinar on-demand here <[[https://turbonomic.com/thx-cloud-status-quo-wbn/]]>.
Here are some additional resources you may find helpful:
- Prepare for End of Support: Windows and SQL 2008 <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-ms-eos/]]> - Introduction to AWS IaaS Solutions <[[https://turbonomic.com/aws-iaas-solutions/]]> - Freshfields Plans AWS and Azure Migrations and Saves 20% on Azure Bill <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/case-studies/freshfields-success-story]]>
If you have any additional questions about how Turbonomic can help your IT organization optimize for performance, cost, and compliance in real-time, please feel free to schedule a meeting with us <[[https://turbonomic.com/request-a-demo/]]>.
We hope you enjoy the recording! -Team Turbonomic
